# Minimal stopwords for code search - only truly meaningless words
# These are filtered when ranking code files
# Keep this list VERY small to preserve search accuracy

# Articles
the
a
an

# Conjunctions
and
or
but

# Prepositions
in
on
at
by
to
of
for
with
from
into
onto
upon
about
through
during
before
after

# Be verbs
is
are
was
were
be
been
being

# Pronouns
it
this
that
these
those
